Perceptor:

another typed message was sent to Dark Rodimus "Dont let them r=
each them, lock down the area if where necesary send me a message in order =
to unlock her stasis pod; is a secret passage there. be sure that she isnt =
rescued... a handcuffs are there in case that they are needed"


From: Pres=
ton Carroll 
Sent: Thursday, February 25, 2010 5:19 PM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogrou=
ps.com 
Subject: Re: Recovering Rodimus/BlackFortress


  
Rodimus had been=
 standing just outside the torture chamber not sure if
he wanted to actuall=
y enter it. there was something about this room
that gave him the chills, e=
specially when he didn't need to go in
there.

Instead he just stood in the=
 shadows, listening the words of the
others like Darkhawk, Scorponok and th=
at Autobot Tuscon. there was
something about that Autobot that seemed to gr=
ate on his nerves. He
wasn't sure what it was, maybe it was his high soundi=
ng talk, maybe it
was his tenacity, maybe it was his . . . .

*SLAM!*

Rodi=
mus was jolted out of his revelry by the doors slamming shut,
cutting him o=
ff from the torture chamber. Inside he could hear
threatening tones coming =
from Scorponok and Darkhawk, and the sound of
a vehicle's engine revving.

=
Rodimus' attention was diverted from further listening as a message
came ov=
er his comms, a text message from Perceptor.

> "Rodimus... Go to this sect=
or and watch out that our enemies doesnt go inside" typed Perceptor fast an=
d send the secret message "They mustnt get her... Do what ever you have to =
to stop them"

"Yes!" Rodimus jumped as he could see the urgency with the s=
peed that
Perceptor was typing the message. "On my way!" he sent back as he=

received the location from Perceptor.

Rodimus was surprised, as the locat=
ion was only a short distance away.
With a thought he quickly shifted into =
his vehicle, gunned his motor
and moved swiftly. He figured the 'her' that =
Perceptor was referring
to was Nightlight. Nightlight was Rodimus' wife, he=
 would not let
those idiot Maximals get their hands on her!

(TAG)

Preston=

(Dark Rodimus)
